creditline: Gift of Henry and Elizabeth Hyatt
description: Window with blue poppy motif with long straight stem; in a wood frame with hinges and handle attached; frame painted pale yellow on inside (handle side); hinges and latch are in D10.4 MS
dimension:
25 x 11 3/4 x 1 11/16 in. (63.5 x 29.85 x 4.29 cm) (without hardware)
25 x 13 1/4 x 3 in. (63.5 x 33.66 x 7.62 cm) (with hardware)
text: Maher repeated decorative elements throughout a homeâ€™s architecture and furnishings, a somewhat obsessive approach to organic design. On the windows and glass doors of the Winton house, he liberally used an image of a poppy. This window was one of three over the main staircase, bringing light into the master bedroom closet. When the homeowners had the residence restored in the 1990s, they donated this window to the MIA.
title: Casement window
